attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make the culprits pay the fine imposed by the OFCOM. The license fee payers should not be made to pay these fines. Do not let the callous culprits get away with getting paid for insulting others and then have the guts to air their own lewd thoughts.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
